H0.text: Lake Neuchatel is in which country. France

H1.text: Lake Neuchatel is in which country. Germany

H2.text: Lake Neuchatel is in which country. Italy

H3.text: Lake Neuchatel is in which country. Suiza

A4.text: Lake Neuchâtel is a lake primarily in Romandy, the French-speaking part of Switzerland.

A5.text: The lake lies mainly in the canton of Neuchâtel, but is also shared by the cantons of Vaud, Fribourg, and Bern.
